channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Columbia University activist Mahmoud Khalil can be deported, immigration judge rules
item.description: A Louisiana immigration judge has ruled that the U.S. can deport Mahmoud Khalil based on the federal government’s argument that he poses a national security risk. His lawyers are expected to appeal, and a federal judge has temporarily barred Khalil’s removal from the country.

item.title: What to know about activist Mahmoud Khalil and his attorneys’ plan to appeal his deportation ruling
Deadly crash raises new questions about safety of New York’s helicopter tours
